"What are the genetic changes related to autoimmune polyglandular syndrome, type 1 ?","Mutations in the AIRE gene cause autoimmune polyglandular syndrome, type 1.  The AIRE gene provides instructions for making a protein called the autoimmune regulator. As its name suggests, this protein plays a
